name: The Burger Adventure
description:
Instructions use WASD or arrow keys to move, and join together the different ingredients of a secret burger for a special reward, but there are enemies you have to defeat. Mouse to move the sword and use space or mouse click to attack. 

This is my team submission for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. It was a good experience and this is a team effort. For this, I need to give the BIGGEST shoutout to my friend pethecat (https://pethecat.itch.io/) go follow him. He came up with most of the code and some artwork. The game is unfinished with no sound and only one level because we were using Construct 3 and I forgot to save for like 3 hr and then Construct  3 crashed and the file was invalid which happened at like 20 minutes until submission time. Anyways, please go follow pethecat. Here is his profile once again : https://pethecat.itch.io/.
